Tbeninnovation/Baiss

Runs LLMs and RAG locally on desktops

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Notebooks for building RAG applications
  • toolkit for evaluating and optimizing LLM and RAG apps
  • Notebooks for building RAG pipelines
  • alternative to RAG for LLMs, skips real-time retrieval by caching knowledge in context
  • GUI for interacting with local LLMs
  • step-by-step notebooks for building RAG with LangChain
  • Curated list of tools for running LLMs locally
  • RAG tutorials and examples using Qdrant, LangChain, OpenAI, and more
  • low-code toolkit for building and evaluating RAG systems
  • open-source platform for building LLM apps and AI workflows
